price: 36. They said: "Put him off and his brother (for a while), and send callers to the cities;
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبۡعَثۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-ib'ʿath fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
